capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been looking into the history of Hogwarts and it seems that Filch has a bit of an... complicated relationship with the school. Apparently, he's been the caretaker for years, but his strict rules and constant grumbling have made him somewhat of a loner. I'm pretty sure that's why he's so keen on enforcing those rules - to feel like he's still in control, even if it's just in a small way.
